abstract: An eight-year veteran of the city police force falsely charged a man with resisting arrest and then bragged to a friend that he had "fried another nigger," federal prosecutors say.
snippet: An eight-year veteran of the city police force falsely charged a man with resisting arrest and then bragged to a friend that he had "fried another nigger," federal prosecutors say.
lead_paragraph: Updated, 2:13 p.m. | A city police officer has been charged with a federal civil rights violation after prosecutors said he used a racial slur while bragging that he had falsely charged a black man with resisting arrest after stopping and frisking him on Staten Island last spring.

headline.main: Officer Faces Civil Rights Charges in Stop-and-Frisk Arrest
